snippet.title: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We are beyond excited to announce the release date for Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor!

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2321470/Deep_Rock_Galactic_Survivor/

Developed by Funday Games
Published by Ghost Ship Publishing

Find out more:
https://www.fundaygames.dk/drgs

Follow Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/drgsurvivor
Discord:  https://www.discord.gg/drg

Follow Funday Games:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fundaygamesdk
Twitter / X: https://x.com/fundaygamesdk
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/FundayGames
